new-request.header-explanation: Find out what moves your community

title.label: Title
title.help-text: So that you can keep track of all your questions. The title is sent to community members on some channels for their information.

text.label: What would you like to know?
text.help-text: Choose a short, simple formulation. Describe exactly what information you need.

schedule-send-for.label: Schedule shipment. Your question will be sent automatically at the set time.

form.submit-button: Send a question to the community

not-found: Oh no, we couldn't find that request.
